name: ELI EARLY ACCESS
description:
STORY

Years after society fell and those left in a broken world, very few remember the world before. Fight your way across the lands as you carry the last of the knowledge to rebuild. (WILL BE IN UPDATE 2.5.0)

EARLY ACCESS

Early access allows you to purchase the game at a 50% rate. Get in on the action sooner than later and enjoy frequent updates all the way to the full release.

BLOOD THIRSTY

When the apocalypse started things from underneath started walking the earth. Kill them all and send them back to the dark  (WILL BE IN UPDATE 2.0.0)

SCAVENGER

Food sources now are how to come by. Luckily we still have chickens. Try to scavenge this food source but be careful your not the only one starving.
